data.eml:eml: New record for the genus Platymessa Mello-Leitao, 1941 in Colombia, with the description of a new species (Opiliones, Cosmetidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Pinzon-M., Conchita A., Townsend, Victor R., Jr.,, Martinez-H., Neis (2017): New record for the genus Platymessa Mello-Leitao, 1941 in Colombia, with the description of a new species (Opiliones, Cosmetidae). ZooKeys 665: 59-70, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.665.11371, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.665.11371
